revision.text: Possibly: Two sermons to young women : I. On female devotion and good works. II. On female meekness. By James Fordyce. (Boston : Printed by Mein and Fleeming, and sold by John Mein at the London Book-Store, north-side of King-Street., MDCCLXVII. [1767]). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/70086905
